sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RegisterService } from 'src/app/services/register/register.service'; import { User, UserRole } from 'src/app/interfaces/user'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.scss'] }) export class RegisterComponent { user: User = { id: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', password: '', phoneNumber: '', role:UserRole.ADMIN }; constructor(private registerService: RegisterService) { } onSubmit(user: any): void { this.registerService.registerUser(this.user) .subscribe( response => { console.log(response); // Gestionarea răspunsului de la server }, error => { console.error(error); // Gestionarea erorilor } ); } }
